definition[0]: relating to a country that controls and rules other countries, usually ones that are far away
example[1]: Britain was the largest colonial power.
definition[1]: made in a style that was common in the US in the 18th century
definition[2]: relating to the US when it was under British rule
example[3]: The town was first established in colonial times.
definition[3]: someone who lives in a colony but who is a citizen of the country that rules the colony
